### Chagos & Western Indian Ocean seabirds: connectivity & conservation
##### Postdoctoral Research Associate, University of Exeter, 2019 - present

This project aims to understand the importance of the Marine Protected Area around the Chagos Archipelago for seabirds in the Western Indian Ocean, and is part of the Bertarelli Programme in Marine Science.
:::

### Environmental drivers of individual and population movement strategies
##### PhD, University of Liverpool, 2015 - 2019

I explored the influence of environmental heterogeneity, as a proxy for resource patchiness, on kittiwake habitat selection, individual consistency, and reproductive success.

:::
